description:
After crash landing on a nearby planet, Midge, Doc, and Marbo find themselves surrounded by nothing but sand. With the Stork inoperable, the trio venture out to explore the planet in the operation-bots but encounter a series of struggles that blow them far from their ship, stranding them. They manage to survive the extreme conditions overnight but just when things seem to be looking up for them, the bugs are confronted by a girl pointing an arrow at them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Survival! Sand Planet / Lost in the Desert
Survival! Suna no Wakusei / Sabaku no Maigo-tachi
サバイバル! 砂の惑星 / 砂漠の迷子たち
